reviewText: At the public library, they were offering this video for about a quarter, so I got it, and it's a good educational video for kids. It came with a teacher's guide so you can use it in a classroom. However, if your child is 7 or older, get a different video, because this video is extremely cheesy and dumbed-down for youngsters. This video follows a girl who learns about electrical safety, and takes her family around the house pointing out electrical hazards and talking about things like, plugging too many things into one outlet, GFCIs, and "Water and electricity don't mix."
